detail_confirm_required_auth: A confirmation mail with instructions has been sent to your email address. Follow those instructions to confirm your email address and activate your account.
text_detail_welcome_auth: Fuse helps developers to build organized and well coded dashboards full of beautiful and rich modules. Join us and start building your application today.
text_more_people_auth: More than 17k people joined us, it's your turn
text_detail_forgot_pass_auth: Fill the form to reset your password
text_invalid_email_forgont_pass_auth: Please enter a valid email address
alert_success_forgont_pass_auth: Password reset sent! You'll receive an email if you are registered on our system.
alert_error_forgont_pass_auth: Something went wrong, please try again later.
detail_set_pass_auth: Create a new password for your account
alert_success_confirm_pass_auth: Your password has been set. Now you can sign in your account
alert_error_confirm_pass_auth: Your password token is not valid, check your mail link
alert_token_expired_pass_auth: Your password token is not valid, check the link you received in the mail
alert_something_wrong_pass_auth: Something went wrong, please try again.
text_valid_email_sign_in_auth: Ingrese una dirección de correo valida
text_user_no_partner_auth: In order to sign in you should have partner attached to your account
